channel.title: Doubt anyone will know this but worth a shot
channel.description:
I wanna make it so when you click the npc to tele it takes you to a cutscene (basically makes the screen fade to black and fade back where you tele)
rep if you can help me

item.title: Doubt anyone will know this but worth a shot
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

[code]public void frame166(int i1, int i2, int i3, int i4, int i5) // CAMERA STUFF! 0 on all makes it lock on that place, make last over 100 to make it go black!
{
outStream.createFrame(166);
outStream.writeByte(i1); // X coord where camera will end within the region
outStream.writeByte(i2); // Y coord where camera will end within the region
outStream.writeWord(i3); // the camera height where it will end
outStream.writeByte(i4); // the camera moving speed
outStream.writeByte(i5); // if this goes above 100 it does something?
sendMessage(“Testing Camera Angle”);
}

public void frame177(int i1, int i2, int i3, int i4, int i5) // similar to 166, a good combo: f177 041 033 014 011 005 {
outStream.createFrame(177);
outStream.writeByte(i1); // X coord within the region middle of your screen will view to
outStream.writeByte(i2); // Y coord within the region middle of your screen will view to
outStream.writeWord(i3); // the height it will be viewing to
outStream.writeByte(i4); // the camera speed? movement? dunno yet
outStream.writeByte(i5); // if this goes above 100 it does something?
//sendMessage(“Frame 177 tested”);
}[/code]

^ Not even mine but im trying to help.

Read full topic
item.source: Doubt anyone will know this but worth a shot
